ValidationRule.description: Link to the documents folder is required when the opportunity is in the stage 3. It is mandatory to store the documents in a place that is easily accessible to other contributors.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.IsBypassVR__c = false, ISBLANK(GoogleDriveFolder__c), ISCHANGED(StageName), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , '3 - Cost Analysis'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , '4 - Proposal/Price Quote'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , '5 - Negotiation/Review'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Closed Won') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide the URL to the documents folder of this opportunity [VR20].
